title: AP Photos: Beijing slowly reopens amid falling virus cases
description: BEIJING (AP) —  Beijing's city zoo and parts of the Great Wall of China have reopened to visitors who book in advance, as the Chinese capital slowly returns to normal amid a sharp fall in...
content:
BEIJING (AP) 
Beijings city zoo and parts of the Great Wall of China have reopened to visitors who book in advance, as the Chinese capital slowly returns to normal amid a sharp fall in the number of new coronavirus cases.
While many of the citys world-famou… [+1984 chars]
